version_description:
- Improved audio quality
- Minor bugs fixed
- Fixed crash issue when login with Facebook

- Improved flow engine, reduced buffering and smoother playback.
- Compatible with more streaming servers.

- Support multi bitrate hls stream.
- Fixed half-screen issue with some h264 stream.
- Compatible with iOS 11

- Faster stream loading.
- Enable Christmas and New Year sale promotion.
- Fixed User Guide screen.

- Supports iPhone X
- Supports RTMFP protocol

- Hardware accelerated HEVC/H265 decoding.
- Native AirPlay and Chromecast support.

- Fixed crash on device with iOS version < 11.2
- Support iPhone XR, XS Max

- Fixed overlay message when connected to a bluetooth device.
- Improved compatibility when casting to AirPlay or Chromecast.
- Mirror bugs fixed.

- Fixed a bug that causes AirPlay unstable on old devices.
- Fixed a bug that causes application to crash on iOS device running iOS 9.3 or lower

- Supports iOS 13
- Improves ChromeCast support.
- Reduces buffering when playing HLS stream.

- Support Samsung and LG TV with AirPlay enabled.
- Fixed a bug that cause bluetooth headphone to conflict with AirPlay feature.

- Fixed loggin issue with Facebook account.
- Minor bugs fixed.

- Support cast video to AirPlay powered Samsung and LG TV.
- Improve ChromeCast support

- Support Samsung and LG TV with AirPlay enabled.
- Fixed a bug that cause bluetooth headphone to conflict with AirPlay feature.

- Compatible with iOS 14 and iPhone 12 series.
- Support MPEG-DASH protocol

- Improve in-app messaging.
- Fixed an issue that makes subscription may not be registered correctly.
